h2_title: Black Bear Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: This is also a key moment to use the Fireproof Mantle from defeating the secret boss. It will not only negate a lot of fire damage, but slowly build your focus up over time to unleash more heavy attacks in your combos.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Bear_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Black Bear Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Black Bear Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
This is also a key moment to use the Fireproof Mantle from defeating the secret boss. It will not only negate a lot of fire damage, but slowly build your focus up over time to unleash more heavy attacks in your combos.
